title: Sync status for b2 worng
body:
I've tried upload 500mb file to b2, and the status shows that this file has been uploaded, but I don't see it over b2 interface, and 'Activity Monitor' show that rclone is uploading.

> What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)

```
➜  ~ rclone -V
rclone v1.32
➜  ~
```

> Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

OS X 10.11.6

> Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

B2

> The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
rclone -v --transfers 10 sync Archive/DataMiningHub.zip.gpg b2:kirill-korinsky/Archive
```

> A log from the command with the `-v` flag (eg output from `rclone -v copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

